Hi Tonismar,

For your attached report, it is indeed an expected behavior in 2.1.3 for not allow report design that has problem to be successfully executed.

Your attached report contains two tables. The first table include a data binding "cod_item" which refers to an in-exist data set column "cod_item". It is a bug in 2.1.1 that we have not add syntax checking for column bindings, and we simply fixed it in 2.1.3.

If all your report designs that are of problem contains such illegal reference then you need to fix them otherwise they would not be able to used for some advanced BIRT features.

If you have report designs which are failed not of this problem please feel free to reopen the bug.

Thanks.
Lin
